      • readFromText

        public java.lang.String readFromText(java.lang.String userId,
                                     java.lang.String text)
        This method reads the text menu passed in by the user and passes it to MenuController.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        text - the text menu passed in by the user
        Returns:
        the choice from the menu

      • readFromJSON

        public java.lang.String readFromJSON(java.lang.String url)
        This method is used to convert JSON HTTP response to menu format.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to the JSON source
        Returns:
        String Formatted String of the menu

      • readFromJPEG

        public java.lang.String readFromJPEG(KitchenSinkController.DownloadedContent jpeg)
        This method uses OCR feature of the Google Vision API to extract menu String from the image uploaded by the user through Line
        Parameters:
        jpeg - DownloadedContent instance of the image file uploaded by the user
        Returns:
        String Menu String processed from the image using Google Vision API

      • buildJson

        private java.lang.String buildJson(KitchenSinkController.DownloadedContent jpeg)
        This method builds the menu in JSON format from a picture of the menu
        Parameters:
        jpeg - the picture of the menu
        Returns:
        the JSON format of the menu
